mapper.select: SELECT A.CityID, B.ProvinceID, B.ProvinceNameCN, B.ProvinceNameEN, C.CountryID, C.CountryNameCN, C.CountryNameEN, A.CityNameCN, A.CityNameEN, A.InUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, A.LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM City A INNER JOIN Province B ON A.ProvinceID = B.ProvinceID INNER JOIN Country C ON B.CountryID = C.CountryID ORDER BY A.InDate DESC LIMIT #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER};
SELECT CityID, ProvinceID, CountryID, CityNameCN, CityNameEN, InUser, InDate, LastEditUser, LastEditDate FROM City WHERE CityID = #{cityID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
